description: This file defines the AuthStorage class responsible for persisting and retrieving authentication tokens using SharedPreferences in a Flutter app.

classes.name: AuthStorage
classes.description: A utility class for saving, retrieving, and clearing access and refresh tokens in persistent storage.

methods.name: saveTokens
methods.description: Stores access and refresh tokens in shared preferences.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Removes the stored tokens from shared preferences.
